articles.author: Fox News
articles.title: Polio live oral vaccine: Here's why the US stopped using it years ago - New York Post
articles.description: The new case raises the issue of polio vaccinations — and what Americans should know to protect their health.
articles.content: An unvaccinated Rockland County, N.Y., resident exposed to an individual who received an oral poliovirus vaccine contracted the neurological disease and is now paralyzed, according to Rockland County… [+8096 chars]
